alert_text: Fishermen advised not to venture into the sea due to rough conditions along the Odisha coast

Strong winds and heavy rainfall expected in coastal districts during the next 48 hours
Low pressure area over the Arabian Sea causing adverse marine conditions

River water levels cross warning mark after heavy monsoon showers
Urban areas experience severe waterlogging after intense rainfall
Dam authorities release excess water due to increased inflow
Tremors felt across multiple districts after early morning seismic activity
Mild earthquake reported near state border with no immediate damage
Seismic event recorded in the northeastern region during early hours

Heatwave conditions persist as temperatures exceed seasonal averages
